title: PhD Position in Medical Physics - Radiation Oncology
description: Research opportunities in advanced radiation therapy techniques, stereotactic radiosurgery, and treatment planning optimization. The successful candidate will work on developing novel approaches to dose delivery and verification.

title: Graduate Research Position - Medical Imaging Physics
description: PhD opportunity in diagnostic imaging physics with focus on CT, MRI, and nuclear medicine. Research involves developing new imaging protocols and radiation dose optimization techniques.

title: PhD Opportunity in Nuclear Medicine Physics
description: Research position focusing on molecular imaging, radiopharmaceutical development, and theranostics. Work involves PET/SPECT imaging optimization and novel tracer development.

title: Medical Physics PhD - Proton Therapy Research
description: Advanced research in proton beam therapy, treatment planning, and Monte Carlo simulations. Focus on pediatric applications and FLASH radiotherapy techniques.

title: PhD in Medical Physics - Radiation Dosimetry
description: Research opportunities in clinical dosimetry, small field dosimetry, and MR-guided radiotherapy. Program includes clinical rotations and comprehensive training.

title: Graduate Position - Adaptive Radiotherapy
description: PhD research in adaptive radiotherapy, real-time imaging, and AI-guided treatment planning. Collaborative work with machine learning and computer vision groups.

title: PhD Opportunity in Brachytherapy Physics
description: Research in high-dose-rate and low-dose-rate brachytherapy, source calibration, and treatment planning. Focus on gynecologic and prostate applications.

title: Medical Physics PhD - MRI-Guided Therapy
description: Cutting-edge research in MRI-guided radiotherapy, real-time motion tracking, and adaptive treatment delivery. Access to state-of-the-art MRLinac systems.
